Articles.Content:
who could make the ksc to a Battlefield?

mods alloved!

kerbtown allowed!

and all sort of other stuff...
How do we win? What's the scoring system? Did you try this yourself? What counts as a Battlefield?
I'm scared of the day someone makes a Kerbal gun mod...

How do we win? What's the scoring system? Did you try this yourself? What counts as a Battlefield?

1:take out all the enmyes 2:how many there are left 3:no 4:planes tanks cars boats togther in a giant mess

This is a poorly constructed "challenge", if you can even call it that.

Please read the Challenge Submission Guide. Once you have a more structured challenge with goals, requirements, points system and so on, feel free to make a new challenge.

That said, thread locked.
